text: How to track how many times a specific email is forwarded to different people?
I was thinking of a custom CTA, but the issue is that it can’t track the native “forward to”  feature. No need to spy on who is the recipient, just count emails.
A service like Litmus Analytics or Email On Acid Analytics can provide the number of forwards, if they still include that data, it’s been awhile since I’ve used it.
Otherwise to my knowledge HubSpot doesn’t have this built in. You could do like a mailto and perhaps see the clicks but it doesn’t mean an email was sent on their end.
